2. Headings¶

Headings (ref) are created by underlining (and optionally overlining) the text with a punctuation character at least as long as the text. The heading levels are normally assumed from the document structure, however, the following convention from the Python’s Style Guide might be used for consistency.

3. Level 1: Part Heading¶

#####################
Level 1: Part Heading
#####################

3.1. Level 2: Chapter Heading¶

************************
Level 2: Chapter Heading
************************

3.1.1. Level 3: Section Heading¶

Level 3: Section Heading
========================

3.1.1.1. Level 4: Section Heading¶

Level 4: Section Heading
------------------------
3.1.1.1.1. Level 5: Section Heading¶
Level 5: Section Heading
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
3.1.1.1.1.1. Level 6: Section Heading¶
Level 6: Section Heading
""""""""""""""""""""""""
